mods.abstract: Tennesse State Guard officers presiding over a meeting of the Second Tennessee Infantry. There are eleven uniformed men sitting at a long table.

Photograph of a monthly meeting held on May 17, 1942 of the Second Tennessee Infantry. This meeting, held at the Noel Hotel, was the last prior to activation of the Tennessee State Guard brigades. At the meeting, Govenor Prentice Cooper announced forty promotions in the Tennessee Guard expansion program. Included in the promotion was J.M. Dickinson, promoted to brigadier general of the Second Brigade. At the time of activation and throughout 1942, the Second Brigade was the largest State Guard brigade.
